column1: images/verschiedenArt_Schmuck_loeten_2_BeinchenVorne,Place the LEDs on the coin in the arrangement{,} as they will later hang on the pendant.
column2: It is important that the long legs of the LEDs (+) are all on one side and all short LED legs (-) are on the other side of the coin.
column3: The long legs of the LEDs (+) should touch each other.
column4: If the legs do not yet touch in your arrangement{,} you can bend the legs towards each other.
column5: Make sure that you can remove the coin again after soldering.

column1: images/verschiedenArt_Schmuck_loeten_3_BeinchenVorneGeloetet-scaled,Heat the leg tips that touch each other with the soldering iron for about 3-4 seconds.
column2: Then hold the solder to the hot legs and the soldering iron and spread the solder over the ends of the legs.
column3: All long leg tips should be soldered together.
column4: No solder should land on the coin and the legs should not be soldered to the coin.

column1: images/verschiedenArt_Schmuck_loeten_4_RingGeloetet,Heat the solder joint you just made again with the soldering iron.
column2: Take the ring with the tweezers and press it with one side into the liquid solder so that the ring extends as far as possible beyond the ends of the legs.
column3: The small ring or the earring hook will later be attached to this.

column1: images/verschiedenArt_Schmuck_loeten_5_RueckseiteGeloetet-scaled,Now turn the coin over. The legs on the other side should also touch each other.
column2: Heat the legs at the solder joint with the soldering iron for about 4 seconds.
column3: Then hold the solder to the heated spot and the soldering iron and connect the legs together with the melting solder.
column4: Alternatively{,} you can also solder the ends of the legs together without a ring and bend the last 4-5 mm of the LED legs at a 90Â° angle{,} so that they form a horizontal edge.

column2: Insert the battery instead. The smooth side of the battery should face the long legs and the ridged side should face the short ones.
column3: You may need to bend the short legs a bit more into a kind of pocket{,} so that they do not touch the edge of the battery.

column1: images/VerschiedenArt-schmuck-loeten-Beispiel1-scaled,Now hook either the small ring into the ring on the front to attach your pendant to a chain{,} or the earring hook to wear your pendant as an earring.
column2: Make sure to close the small rings carefully{,} so that you don't lose your pendant.

column1: images/VerschiedenArt-Schmuck-loeten-Beispiel2-scaled,If you like{,} you can now decorate your jewelry pendant with small decorative pendants.
column2: Just make sure that the decorative elements{,} if they are made of metal{,} do not get between the LEDs and their legs and connect + and - there{,} causing a short circuit.
column3: If there are still small pointed ends of the LEDs or solder protruding{,} you can carefully cut them off with side cutters.
